segments.text: Could you please reserve a taxi for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think a private vehicle might be more to your liking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A private vehicle ? No , thanks , I won't need one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even better than a private vehicle is a limo . How does that sound ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A taxi it is . Where will you be headed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Rockefeller Center . Can you get the taxi here immediately , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A taxi will be here in just a minute , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I'll get my coat and come downstairs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The taxi will be ready when you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
